Name: Dragon Saddle Melee
About the game: Jump into an online game easily with automated matchmaking, or play solo. Knock out enemies by bashing them from above. Battle through progressively more difficult rounds Grab power ups to help you survive and defeat the other dragons The Challenge Jump into an online game easily with automated matchmaking Play the same game offline in solo mode Battle through progressively more difficult rounds Bash and fight enemy birds and other players before they bash you Become a Survivor by making it through all rounds before running out of lives Win the melee by being the Survivor with the highest score
